title: Im d5 with a 73 percent win rate matched with gold 3 players who have a 45
body: its ruining the games because the gold 3 kids are inting and playing awfully. NO they don't have similar mmr. they are 500mmr below me

replies.body: Well they were duoing with the Plat 1 so obviously, that's the only reason they were there.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LLwO1Atj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-30T02:48:56.814+0000)
>
> Well they were duoing with the Plat 1 so obviously, that's the only reason they were there.

Detective Sukishoo Holmes is on the case
well u should win easily cuz ur so good
Riot is trying to get you to a 50% winrate. Fun fun.
This has been happening to me too. I was getting low gold and high silver in my game and I am plat 3 with a 53/54% WR?
Dont know why you was downvoted, this is a legit thing too complain about. In plat i get a silver player with 35% wr on my team.
If you're good enough you should be able to carry yourself.
